title: The Haunting of Hill House
author: Shirley Jackson
description: A chilling tale of a haunted house and the people who become involved with it.

title: The Shining
author: Stephen King
description: A horror novel about a family who becomes isolated in a haunted hotel with terrifying consequences.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A story about a troubled teenager navigating the complexities of life and growing up.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who goes missing and the media frenzy that follows.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: A science fiction epic set on the desert planet of Arrakis, where noble houses vie for control of a precious substance called spice.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: The former First Lady of the United States shares her personal journey from her childhood in Chicago to the White House.

title: The Martian
author: Andy Weir
description: A gripping story of an astronaut stranded on Mars and his struggle for survival.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
description: A gripping mystery involving a journalist and a hacker uncovering dark secrets.

title: The Godfather
author: Mario Puzo
description: A classic novel about the powerful and dangerous Corleone crime family.

title: The Best of Edgar Allan Poe
author: Edgar Allan Poe
description: A collection of Edgar Allan Poe's most famous short stories, including 'The Tell-Tale Heart' and 'The Raven.'

title: Into the Wild
author: Jon Krakauer
description: The true story of Christopher McCandless's journey into the Alaskan wilderness.

title: The Road
author: Cormac McCarthy
description: A harrowing post-apocalyptic novel about a father and son traveling through a desolate world.

title: The Ocean at the End of the Lane
author: Neil Gaiman
description: A novel blending fantasy and mystery as a man recalls a magical and haunting childhood.

title: The Night Circus
author: Erin Morgenstern
description: A magical tale of a mysterious circus and two young illusionists bound in a high-stakes competition.
